nodes.text: Risso was a planet located in the Inner Rim region. Author and historian Eloc Throno included a map with the location of Risso in his book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, a guide that detailed the planet Batuu and its inhabitants. The planet shared its name with the Risso hot springs moon, which was known for its thermal waters.
Risso was mentioned in the 2020 reference book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by Cole Horton.
